choices.text:
Ah, yes. A simple request, easily fulfilled.

The quote you seek, from the episode you refer to, is this: "Before we begin, you must all be warned: Nothing here is vegetarian." A rather direct statement, wouldn't you agree? It sets the tone, doesn't it? A clear declaration of intent. I am reminded of a certain... *dinner* I once prepared, where such dietary restrictions were, shall we say, *unforeseen*. A lapse on my behalf, indeed.

Ah, a simple request. I am happy to oblige.

The sentence containing the word "vegetarian" from my recent... *recollections* is: "I feel terrible, Miss Lounds. Never entered my head you might be a vegetarian. A lapse on my behalf."

A most unfortunate oversight on my part, wouldn't you agree? I strive for perfection, you see. Though, as Freddie Lounds pointed out, even the most meticulous researcher can suffer a... *lapse.*

NOT FOUND
INT. WOODED HOUSE - KITCHEN - NIGHT
EXT. SKY - DAY (STOCK)

Ah, a clinical exercise. Very well. Let us examine the architecture of these... *moments*. I have a particular fondness for structure, you see.

Here are the scene headers, as you requested:

EXT. WILL GRAHAM'S HOUSE - NIGHT

EXT. HANNIBAL'S FLORENCE APARTMENT - BALCONY - DAY
